sources.title: The Professor And The Madman | Full Movie | Epic Drama | Mel Gibson | Sean Penn
sources.description:
The Professor And The Madman | Nollywood - Based on the worldwide best-selling novel by Simon Winchester, THE PROFESSOR AND THE MADMAN is an extraordinary true tale of madness, genius, and obsession about two remarkable men who created literary history with the writing of the Oxford English Dictionary.
2019.  Stars: Mel Gibson, Sean Penn, Eddie Marsan, Natalie Dormer
*Licensed from Voltage Pictures. All rights reserved*

metadata.Plot: Professor James Murray begins work compiling words for the first edition of the Oxford English Dictionary in the mid-19th century, and receives over 10,000 entries from a patient at Broadmoor Criminal Lunatic Asylum, Dr. William Minor.
metadata.Writer: Todd Komarnicki, Farhad Safinia, Simon Winchester
metadata.Actors: Mel Gibson, Sean Penn, Eddie Marsan
metadata.Country: United States, Mexico, United Kingdom, France, Belgium, Iceland, Ireland, Hong Kong
